Offers and Packages

Hotel Deals in Charleston, SC

Special Offers & Packages

Your Charleston getaway deserves the utmost in comfort, amenities, and welcoming charm – incredible value is just a bonus. The Andrew Pinckney Inn offers hotel deals in Charleston, SC that are as unmatched as our hospitality.

Advance Purchase Rate

Planning ahead? Enjoy 6% off our Rates when you book this Advance Purchase offer at least 21 days before your arrival.

There is a two-night minimum length of stay when arrival is on a Friday or Saturday night. A full, non-refundable prepayment is required at the time of booking. No refund will be issued in cases of cancellation, no-show or early departure. This offer is only available when booked directly on our website. Subject to availability and blackout dates.
Book Now Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Stay More, Save More 3 Night Package-10% Discount

The longer you stay, the more you save. Turn your overnight trip into a true getaway with 10% off our best available rate on stays of three nights.
Book Now 
Terms & Conditions

10% off 3-Night Stays
Terms & Conditions Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Stay more, Save More 4 +Days-15% Discount

The more time you spend, the greater your savings become. Transform your overnight stay into an authentic getaway with discounts of 15% on our best available rate for stays exceeding 4 nights.
Book Now 
Terms & Conditions

15% off 4 or more nights
Terms & Conditions 
Second Sunday on King Street

Book your stay over the 2nd Sunday night of any month and receive 15% off that Sunday (and following Monday) night when you book direct from our website.
Book Now

[Page Title: Events In Charleston SC | Andrew Pinckney Inn]

Skip to Content 
Close

Check Availability
Check In Check out Adults 1 2 3 4 5 6 Promo Code Check Availability 
Happenings

Events in Charleston, SC

Happening atThe Andrew Pinckney Inn

Let our Charleston events calendar inspire your next stay. From weekly farmers markets to annual arts festivals, there’s always something to do in Charleston – and with on-site events and artist workshops, time spent at The Andrew Pinckney Inn is just as culturally enriching.
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
ACTIVITIES AT THE INN

Complimentary Daily Breakfast

A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily in our rooftop Solarium. Enjoy artisanal offerings from local bakers alongside views of the Holy City.
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Activities at the Inn

Complimentary Afternoon Wine & Cheese Reception

Wine, cheese, and charcuterie are the perfect reason for an afternoon visit to our beautiful Solarium. Greet, gather, and enjoy the camaraderie of your fellow guests.

close

[Page Title: Event Venues In Charleston SC | Andrew Pinckney Inn]

Skip to Content 
Close

Check Availability
Check In Check out Adults 1 2 3 4 5 6 Promo Code Check Availability 
Gather

Venues in Charleston, SC

Charleston Gatherings
Intimate 
With unmatched service and historic charm, The Andrew Pinckney Inn's venues in Charleston, SC are picturesque backdrops for intimate meetings and events, and perfectly positioned for your guests to take advantage of our ideal downtown setting.

Charleston

Weddings

Just steps away from the city's best restaurants, churches, plantations, and famed historic sites, the Inn is an elegant and convenient choice for an elopement or for wedding blocks and stays for the happy couple.

The Solarium
Beautifully restored and with breathtaking views of the Holy City, the hotel’s original Solarium is an intimate destination for weddings, private dinners, and inspired meetings. 
The Most Gracious of Events
From intimate, romantic elopements to meetings, gatherings, and the most joyous of celebrations – The Andrew Pinckney Inn is an ideal Charleston destination at which to bring people together. 
Plan Your Event

Our team is here to ensure that your Charleston meeting or elopement event is a success. Fill out the form below to begin planning.
First Name Last Name Email Phone Date of Event Comments I have read and agree to the . Privacy Policy Yes, I would like to receive emails with exclusive specials and offers. Submit

Check In Check out Adults 1 2 3 4 5 6 Promo Code Check Availability 
Southern Stay
A Quintessentially Your browser does not support the video tag. 
The Andrew Pinckney Inn

Warmth
Grandeur and 
With unmatched service and true Southern hospitality, The Andrew Pinckney Inn couples old-world graciousness with every modern comfort. Meticulously restored and located in the heart of beautiful downtown Charleston, the Inn redefines historic charm with every visit.

Our Site
Book On 
01

Rate Guarantee
Best 
You’ll receive our lowest possible rate when you book directly on our website. We'll match any lower, publicly available rate for the same dates and the same room type – guaranteed.

02

Access
Exclusive 
Book directly for special packages and promotions, exclusive and access to all of the Inn's room types, available only on our website.
access to our calendar of events, 
03

Hidden Fees
No 
Our rates are free of hidden fees or taxes when you book directly, with the best and most current information here on our site.

The Best Downtown Stay

True Historic Charleston

Three hundred years of history reside in the Ansonborough neighborhood at the corner of Church and Pinckney Streets, where The Andrew Pinckney Inn encompasses two beautifully restored historic buildings.

Prev

Next

The Best Downtown Stay

In the Middle of It All

Convenience meets comfort in the heart of the Historic District, and the Inn is steps away from the historic city market, celebrated restaurants, shopping and entertainment, art galleries, secret alleyways and gardens and all that makes Charleston the #1 City in the US according to Condé Nast and Travel + Leisure.

Prev

Next

The Best Downtown Stay

Happenings and Events

Enjoy daily complimentary breakfast and afternoon refreshments in our enchanting rooftop Solarium, while weekly events and workshops give food for thought.

Prev

Next

The Best Downtown Stay

Real Southern Hospitality

Warm and welcoming, The Andrew Pinckney Inn prides itself on service, and our concierge team stands ready to assist with every arrangement.

Prev

Next

Stay

In True Charleston Style
Rooms & Suites 
Happenings at The Inn

Enjoy an expanded continental breakfast featuring hot items and pastries from local bakeries as well as fruits, cereals, yogurts and more. There are always gluten-free items available for our guests. Relax at the end of a busy day while enjoying our afternoon wine & cheese reception overlooking the steeples and rooftops of historic downtown.
Events Calendar 
From Our Guests

Gracious Words

Charming Boutique Hotel

From the time you arrive to when you leave everyone on the staff is wonderful and they do a fantastic job of making you feel welcome. The rooms are decorated beautifully and the amenities are first class. The evening wine and cheese reception was great and the enhanced continental breakfast was magnificent. Try it…you’ll love it!
Gene C | Tripadvisor 
Perfect Central Location

Our room was beautiful, comfortable, and the Inn has all the amenities we expect from a boutique hotel – this has to be one of the best locations and values in Charleston. Just a block from the French Quarter area, we had a comfortable walk to any historic sites, restaurants, and neighborhoods we wanted to see. A special thanks to the outstanding staff.
hooplafive | Tripadvisor 
Wonderful Getaway

This was our first time staying at The Andrew Pinckney Inn, but it certainly will not be the last. Such a friendly staff and wonderful, newly renovated guest rooms. We enjoyed the rooftop Solarium which is where they serve their afternoon receptions and delicious breakfast. By the way, did I mention the location? Just footsteps from the City Market and surrounded by great restaurants.
James G | Tripadvisor 
Explore

Charleston

Indulge in Southern Charm in the heart of the Historic District.
Learn More 
Tour The Inn

Stroll through photos for a peek at The Andrew Pinckney Inn.
View More
